features: ADJUSTABLE 8 HEIGHTS SUIT FOR ALL SLEEPERS: Our adjustable contour pillow has three layers to customize your own side sleeper pillow. You can customize 5 different combinations of layers which create eight heights such as 1.2'', 1.5'', 2.3'', 2.4'', 2.7'', 3.5'', 3.9'' and 4.7''. Try to find ''just right'' position of your cervical pillow to relieve your neck or back pain whatever you are stomach sleepers, side sleepers or back sleepers.

MEDIUM FIRM CERTIPUR-US MEMORY FOAM PILLOWS PROVIDE SUPERIOR SUPPORT FOR YOUR NECK: Too soft or too firm contour pillow can not provide just right support relaxing your neck. We chose medium firm CertiPUR-US memory foam suitable for most people to make contour pillow, providing superior support with 8 heights for different people's neck curve for less neck pain. Our adjustable cervical pillow won't go flat after a long time using.

ICE COOLING PILLOW FOR HOT SLEEPERS: Our cervical pillow adjustable is a removable and washable cooling cover. You can gently hand wash or dry clean the pillowcase. The soft cooling material provides a cooler sleeping experience than cotton and makes you cool all night. Our contour pillow adjustable has ventilation holes to help alleviate excessive heat build-up.

INNER PILLOWCASE FOR LONGER SERVICE LIFE: Each layer of adjustable memory foam pillows is equipped with an inner pillowcase, which can protect the memory foam from being torn while adjusting the cervical pillow. It is very convenient to adjust the contour pillow with the inner case. It can prevent memory foam layers from sticking together.

A LIFETIME WARRANTY WE CAN ASSURE YOU: We can give you a lifetime warranty on your adjustable contour pillow. For any reason you are not entirely happy, we will replace or return your contour pillow. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will provide you 7x24 hours service.

USING IT AT A ROOM OF IDEAL TEMPERATURE FOR PROPER SOFTNESS: The softness/firmness of the memory foam is affected by ambient temperature. We recommend keeping the memory foam at a room temperature of 15 to 20 degrees for a period of time to achieve the ideal softness.

EXPLANATION OF MEMORY FOAM'S ODOR: When you open the package, the contour pillow adjustable may still have a "foamy " smell because we packaged cervical pillow quickly after producing. Our memory foam is certified by CertiPUR-US. Using the contour pillow directly is not harmful. If you really mind it, You can take the cervical pillow core out of the pillowcase and let your side sleeper pillow air out for 2 days or wash the pillowcase of your cervical pillow. This smell will fade away.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LOFE MEMORY FOAM ADJUSTABLE CONTOUR PILLOW

USING IT AT A ROOM OF IDEAL TEMPERATURE FOR PROPER SOFTNESS The softness/firmness of the memory foam is affected by ambient temperature. We recommend keeping the memory foam at a room temperature of 15 to 20 degrees for a period of time to achieve the ideal softness.

UNIQUE 8 HEIGHTS SUIT ALL SLEEPERS Our contour pillow has three layers to customize your own memory foam pillows. You can customize 5 different combinations of layers which create eight heights such as 1.2'', 1.5'', 2.3'', 2.4'', 2.7'', 3.5'', 3.9'' and 4.7''.

PREMIUM MEDIUM FIRM MEMORY FOAM PROVIDING SUPERIOR SUPPORT We use high-quality and medium firm memory foam of our adjustable cervical pillow, which provides superior support for your neck and head, especially for side and back sleepers. Our memory foam is certified by CertiPUR-US. Our side sleeper pillow is safe and durable.

REMOVABLE AND MACHINE WASHABLE COVER Our adjustable contour pillow contains a removable and machine washable cover. This super soft material is hypoallergenic and breathable which can wick away moisture and help you feel not too hot NNER PILLOWCASE FOR LONGER SERVICE LIFE Each layer of memory foam is equipped with an inner pillowcase, which can protect the memory foam from being torn while adjusting the cervical pillow. It is very convenient to adjust the contour pillow with the inner case. It can prevent memory foam layers from sticking together. VENTILATION HOLES FOR ALLEVIATING HEAT BUILD-UP Lofe adjustable memory foam pillows has ventilation holes to help alleviate excessive heat build-up.

CLOSE TO THE NATURAL CURVE-FIT YOUR NECK PERFECTLY Different heights of your side sleeper pillow has different functions. 3.9'' low profile side of the cervical pillow closes to your neck's curve and relieve neck and shoulder pain while 4.7'' high profile side of your contour pillow provides superior support. 3.2'' Sunken area molds to your head's shape.

LOFE Adjustable Bed Sheet Organizer Bands Lofe Buckwheat Pillow LOFE Adjustable Stomach Sleeper Pillows Lofe Organic Toddler Pillow Adjustable Body Pillow Lofe Buckwheat Bolster Pillow Size 15 x 1.5 inches 14 x 20 inches/20 x 28 inches 24 x 16 inches 13 x 18 inches 54 x 20 inches 17 x 6 inches Height adjustable adjustable 1 inches/2.5 inches/3.5 inches/4 inches adjustable 8 inches adjustable Stuffing Material 100% Buckwheat Hulls Gel Infused Memory Foam Hypoallergenic pearl fiber Shredded Memory Foam 100% Buckwheat Hulls Cover Material Soft elastic fabric 100% organic cotton Washable Bamboo Cover 100% organic cotton Washable Bamboo/Cooling Cover 100% organic cotton Adjustable Yes Yes YES Yes Yes Yes Target People Suitable for Everyone For Side and Back Sleepers For Stomach /Side/Back Sleepers For toddler aged from 2 to 5 years Suitable for Everyone For Side and Back Sleepers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that this pillow! It is adjustable with removable layers. I need a very thin pillow and this is perfect! Very comfortable, easily removable cover, easy to wash. Not hot to sleep on at all. You can customize the thickness very quickly and easily! I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that this pillow is adjustable it's helped my neck pain quite a bit because it's kinda like playdo it molds to you it's firm but soft at the same time,I will buy agian

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adjustable height pillow with soft foam
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pillow! I have so much trouble finding a pillow that isn’t too tall. The adjustability of this allows so much flexibility. I also like a solid foam, contour pillow which this is. My only reason for giving it four stars instead of five is I wish there were actually, a thinner layer of foam as opposed to two the same height. Otherwise I cannot complain. I’ve slept like a baby every night since I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pillow ever!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow! What can I say. I have bought pillow after pillow trying to find one that works with my neck. I love the 3 layers it offers. I removed one for perfect height for my neck. It's the right amount of sponge and 3 makes it firm and 2 is medium firmness. One being super soft and low. I recommend this pillow for anyone with cervical issues. With the layers, you will find this pillow to be exactly what everyone has been searching high and low for. I have had mine for 2 months..this is perfect for back and side sleeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supportive, but not a Brick!
reviews.reviewText: After trying many other pillows I purchased the Lofe Adjustable Pillow in 2022 to alleviate waking up with neck pain/stiff neck. It's a great pillow. I'm a small framed 63 year old male weighing about 125 lbs. I'm a back sleeper, and sleep with the lower side of the pillow under my neck. I love the fact that you can change the height or loft of the pillow by removing one or more of the memory foam layers. After experimenting with the different combinations I achieved pain free results with all the layers in place. I was truely surprised! Being petite I figured a lower loft would be better for me, but I was wrong. The pillow is supportive without feeling hard like your head is on a brick. My head creates a slight indentation in the pillow. It is not springy like latex pillows that sometimes feel bouncy like they're pushing up against your head. This pillow also stays cool. I think this pillow is a great value. After 1 year this pillow looks as good as new. I hope readers find this review helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great for my small 7 year old daughter on the lowest level. Will be buying the travel size for myself as after trying the regular one I think the travel size will be better for me with 2 layers which is pretty similar to the regular one with 1 layer. The only thing I could say is that the pillow case it comes with slides a little which isn't optimal with how my bed is but I can just shove something in that gap at the top and it's fine. The softness of this is also perfect as pillows that are too firm will give me headaches and make me feel lightheaded but this one is great. Soft but not too soft you sink too much. I am 130-145 pounds as I'm sure different weights work different with different pillows. It's REALLY hard to find a decent flatter pillow WITH the neck curve. Please do try this one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work for me.
reviews.reviewText: Got the pillow out. Let it air for 48 hours. I had high hopes! It isn’t firm enough to support my neck through the night. Goes flat. Returned it😞

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband was getting horrible neck issues. We tried numerous pillows until I researched and found a memory foam should help. I ordered this one and it did the trick. He loves it and so far no more neck issues. Some complain of a smell when it’s opened but we never had anything like that. Great choic!
Bought as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves it. The adjustable layers were the selling feature for me as I wasn’t sure the height she would prefer.
I got the soft one. Not as soft as I expected but it improved my sleep quality and reduced my neck and shoulder pain :)
